headline: Looking For Yields: TXNM, Altria, And WEC Energy Are Consistent Moneymakers
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. TXNM Energy, Altria, and WEC Energy have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. These companies currently offer dividend yields of up to 7%.
